title: Unable to reconnect to game - Black loading screen
body: My game ended but was not directed to score board so i closed the application. I tried to log back in but it show the "Reconnect button" and stopped at loading screen :( got error message "Unable to connect to server, please check your internet connection" my friend says I'm in game but thats not true

replies.body:
This may have happened as a result of a hiccup with the game server that prevented it from reporting the results of the match. We refer to this as a *ghost game*, and in most cases, they don't last longer than a few hours at most.

Let me know if you're still seeing this issue.
Same. Happened some hours back, thought by now that there were server issues. But nothing yet. No idea, what's up.
